about_the_game:
Dino Dino – The game collection for all dinosaur fans. Find out everything about dinosaurs in mini-games and discover the secrets of the prehistoric age.



Dino Dino is designed to playfully introduce big and small dinosaur fans to the world of dinosaurs.



In a modern design and with hand-drawn illustrations, Dino Dino sheds light on the way of life, appearance, social and hunting behavior and conveys basic knowledge about the different dinosaur species. Thanks to a cooperation with the Paleontological Society of Germany, the latest findings await you, as they have never been found in any other dinosaur game before. What did the dinosaurs actually look like? Did Spinosaurus eat fish? Which one is heavier, an excavator or Tyrannosaurus Rex? How big did Brachiosaurus get? Find out in our game – and even create your own coloring dinosaurs!



These dinosaurs can be discovered:

  • Allosaurus
  • Ankylosaurus
  • Archaeopteryx
  • Baryonyx
  • Brachiosaurus
  • Deinonychus
  • Dilophosaurus
  • Diplodocus
  • Gallimimus
  • Iguanodon
  • Maiasaura
  • Microraptor
  • Pachycephalosaurus
  • Parasaurolophus
  • Plateosaurus
  • Psittacosaurus
  • Spinosaurus
  • Stegosaurus
  • Titanoceratops
  • Triceratops
  • Tyrannosaurus
  • Ubirajara
  • Utahraptor
  • Velociraptor



Mini-games that are waiting for you:

  • Paint dinos and give them a feather coat!
  • Feed dinosaurs and find out what they liked to eat!
  • Which one is heavier, an excavator or Tyrannosaurus Rex?
  • Dig through different layers of rock and soil until you find the bones of the biggest dinosaurs!
  • Put dinos back in one piece correctly, like a puzzle!
  • Compare dinosaurs in the size parade!
  • Discover how dinosaurs are related to one another in the family tree!
  • Take a closer look at the special features of the dinosaurs in the detail view!
  • Deepen your knowledge in the dino card collection!
  • Rummage through an extensive catalog of questions anwered by real paleontologists!

name: Dino Dino – Playful Paleontology

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Playfully extend your knowledge about dinosaurs in a collection of mini games. Created in cooperation with the German Paleontological Society, featuring voice recordings and hand-drawn illustrations, Dino Dino sets out to awaken your kids's interest in complex topics while being a lot of fun.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Traditional Chinese*, Simplified Chinese*, Japanese*, Korean*, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*, Turkish*
*languages with full audio support
